feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.23
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: #17602 by @AnkityadavIITR in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17604
  • feat: v2 multiple length event types and their bookings by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17598
  • feat: v2 confirm / decline booking endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17578
  • chore: update Instant Meeting Error Message by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17617
  • fix: mark guest are no show by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17588
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17619
  • fix: Refactor publicPageUrl to use getBookerBaseUrlSync like elsewhere by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17607
  • fix: fetch next batch if event types are empty and cursor exists by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17109
  • chore: Automated API v2 OpenAPI spec generation by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17046
  • fix: skip triggering webhook in case of duplicate email by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17612
  • refactor: change title by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17623
  • fix: fix telli URL [CAL-4702] by @Chiranjeev-droid in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17618
  • fix: make actions column sticky in members list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17554
  • chore: v4.6.23 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17620

New Contributors

  • @AnkityadavIITR made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17604
  • @eunjae-lee made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17554

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.22...v4.6.23

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Cleanup Close.com by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16929
  • feat: Add API v2 logs to axiom by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17595
  • chore: upgrade @vercel/og lib by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17503
  • perf: Move /me stats to separate tRPC handler by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17206
  • chore: typo in webhook by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17628
  • fix: BookerEmbed atom localStorage issues by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17611
  • feat: allow marking no show after booking has started by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17625
  • feat: Salesforce when create contacts under an account if creating leads is chosen [CAL-4713] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17630
  • fix: useOAuthClient is not initialized by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17637
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17629
  • fix: resolved troubleshoot-sidbar bug by @sachinsiddhu112 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17613
  • chore: routingform org attribute seed by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17510
  • chore: remove wrong logs by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17648
  • fix: unable to update host schedules by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17649
  • chore: v4.6.24 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17639

New Contributors

  • @sachinsiddhu112 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17613

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.23...v4.6.24

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(CAL-4730): add sk-SK language by @maxprilutskiy in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17652
  • fix: z index issue on dropdown menu by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17656
  • feat: exclude emails and domains by @VK-RED in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17591
  • fix: Meeting not created in HubSpot for contacts by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17661
  • fix: filter cal video logo by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17663
  • feat: Implements maxLeadThreshold by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17643
  • fix: remove cal video logo from select by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17665
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17666
  • feat: attribute weights and virtual queues by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17567
  • feat: Populate gCal calendar cache via webhooks by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/11928
  • fix: unable to lock individual event type creation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17668
  • feat: insights routing forms by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17583
  • test: Add test to validate error when the where object contain null values and 'in' field is undefined by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17670
  • fix: Preview queue position and contact owner in preview by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17552
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17674
  • fix: removed calendar cache admin page by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17676
  • revert: "feat: Populate gCal calendar cache via webhooks (#11928)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17675
  • fix: update current cursor by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17626
  • chore: v4.7.0 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17664

New Contributors

  • @VK-RED made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17591

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.24...v4.7.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Remove playwright install API v2 E2E by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17677
  • perf: optimize team admin check queries by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17681
  • fix: Hotfix/ Fix contact owner routing by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17684
  • test: findTeamMemberEmailFromCrm by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17685

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.0...v4.7.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: large org routing insights UI issues by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17687
  • fix: routing column filters by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17688
  • perf: optimize organization admin check by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17683
  • chore: Found a critical index missing on profileId by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17690
  • fix: how-to-setup-api-in-a-local-instance.mdx in docs with correction after api-v2 by @sathuli2710 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17667
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17691
  • chore: Release v4.7.2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17692

New Contributors

  • @sathuli2710 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17667

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.1...v4.7.2
